version_description:
+ LITERALLY visit your friends!
You can now deliver your doorman in a friend's elevator once per day and when you show up in their tower they will receive a BUX tip!
+ Fixed bug where game was showing "empty" gifts
+ Option to return a visit!

+ New floors: Shrimp Buffet, Law Offices, Broadway Theatre, Tourist Trap, Metal Studio, Carmine Apts., Relax Apts., & Regal Apts.!
+ New costumes: Blink, Blacksmith & Monkey!
+ View past towers of your friends!
+ Rebalanced Buy More coin

+ Golden Ticket Raffles Every Hour!
+ New VIP Perk: Automatic Elevators!
+ 2 New Costumes: Bikachu & Snapdog

- Fixed auto-elevator sometimes getting stuck!
===New in 3.3.0!
+ Golden Ticket Raffles Every Hour!
+ New VIP Perk: Automatic Elevators!
+ 2 New Costumes: Bikachu & Snapdog

+ Floors under construction now show floor type
+ Visits from friends can now move in a bitizen
+ Option to "Add Friend" after a visit

+ Current residents now up-skilled when applying a gold ticket to a residential floor
+ Fixed a re-naming bug that could corrupt game saves
+ Other small bug fixes
+ Small bug fixes involving text entry

+ Fixed some issues with video ads
+ Fixed "Cloud Topper" achievement
+ Fixed icon badge count not being cleared
+ Fixed video ad rewards sometimes showing up as -1
Over 60 fun Tiny Tower iMessage stickers! Add bitizens to your photos or pixelized hats and glasses to others!
Fixed crash when saving a shared item to your photo roll.
- Fixed a bug which lowered the volume of other audio sources.

Winter Festive Icon
+ small bug fixes
Attempt to fix sporadic crash on startup
Back to the old icon, typos and small bug fixes!
Support for iPhone X

+ Updated Privacy Policy
+ Small bug fixes
+ Increased Friends List size
+ Player visitors now have full priority for delivery
+ Number of remaining player visitors now shown

+ 2 New Costumes!
+ New Summer Music Track
+ Sort by Dream Job in Bitizen List by tapping JOB tab twice
New in 3.3.13
+ Updated Privacy Policy
+ Small bug fixes
+ Increased Friends List size
+ Player visitors now have full priority fo

3.5.0 is dedicated to our amazing Discord Mods!
Particular thanks to jgeorge, Bruce, BeccaJay & Martineet!

+ 3 new costumes!
+ Return to prev page after sending bzn
+ Tower now shows under stacked menus
+ Fixed tower cache bug
+

3.5.1 is dedicated to our amazing Discord Mods!
Particular thanks to jgeorge, Bruce, BeccaJay & Martineet!
+ 3 new costumes!
+ Return to prev page after sending bzn
+ Friends count shown on Friends List
+ Fixed tower cache bug
+ Fixe

+ VIP Trial
+ New Auto Enter feature in 1hr Raffle!
+ No delay between elevator visitors for VIPs
+ BB Notifications settings changed to a toggle for game generated BB posts
+ Fixed image sharing crash
+ Fixed bug preventing editing/deletio

+ Bug Fixes
New in 3.5.2:
+ VIP Trial
+ New Auto Enter feature in 1hr Raffle!
+ No delay between elevator visitors for VIPs
+ BB Notifications settings changed to a toggle for game generated BB posts
+ Fixed image sharing crash
+ Fixe

+ New & luxurious Marble Lift!
+ New wet & wild new Hydro Lift!
+ Reduced Raffle Auto-Entry cost by 700 bux
+ Changed VIP Trial duration to 5 days
+ Support for Upsidedown orientation
+ Prevent visiting towers with 1 floor

Al

+ Startup crash fix!!!

New in 3.6.0
+ New & luxurious Marble Lift!
+ New wet & wild new Hydro Lift!
+ Reduced Raffle Auto-Entry cost by 700 bux
+ Changed VIP Trial duration to 5 days
+ Prevent visiting towers with 1 floor

+ Bug fixes
+ Removed Facebook button
Introducing TT Polls! Vote on important issues right from the Main Menu!
+ Support for new missions, BB posts and VIP sales

+Bug fixes!

+ New Bitizen Customization menu

+ Option to only accept visits from friends

More bug fixes!
+ Support for new missions, BB posts and VIP sales

+ New Floors!
+ New Costumes!
+ New BB Posts!
+ Improved Friend List!

+ Ability to sort Friends List by "Visited"
+ Attempted fix for crashing when sorting friends list
+ VIPs now unlock their respective costumes.
+ Moved button for choosing specific new floor to bottom
+ Bug fixes
+ 12 New Costumes!
+ Small fixes for some of the new costumes

== NEW BITIZEN PETS!!! ==
Unlock and adopt pets for your bitizens! Over 50 pets to collect that will follow your bitizens wherever they go, even when visiting your friends!
